project.ItemDescriptionShort: Slight balance changes and inventory stack sizes increased
project.Title: Austin's Mod
project.ItemDescription:
The goal of this mod is to reduce some of artificial difficulty imposed by inventory management and curve the difficulty with minor rules and character balances.
[h1]Rules Changes[/h1] [list] [*] Affliction/Virtue chance is now 50/50 chance from 75/25 [*] Stress reduction from killing blow is now 5 from 3 [*] Stress reduction chance on killing blow is now 80% from 50% [*] Stress reduction from critical hit is now 5 from 3 [*] Stress reduction chance for companions on critical strike is now 50% from 25% [*] Stress damage at lower light levels is slightly lower (-5) [*] Player crit chance at lower light levels now matches monster crit changes increases (light) [+0, +1, +2, +3, +5] (dark) [/list]
[h1]Trinket Changes[/h1] [b]Sharpened Letter Opener Trinket[/b] [list] [*] Now gives +30% damage vs blighted enemies, no longer gives +25% damage to melee skills [*] Now gives +10% accuracy vs blighted enemies, no longer gives +10% accuracy to melee skills [/list]
[h1]Heroes[/h1] [b]Grave Robber[/b] [list] [*] Shadow Fade +10 dodge duration increased from 4 rounds to 5 [*] Shadow Fade +% crit change increased from [+4%, +5%, +6%, +7%, +8%] to [+12%, +14%, +16%, +18%, +20%] [*] Poison Dart blight damage increased from [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] to [2, 3, 4, 5, 6] [*] Poison Dart blight resist debuff now lasts 4 rounds to match the blight duration [*] Poison Dart now has a chance [100%, 110%, 120%, 130%, 140%] to apply a +2 SPD buff to the target for 4 rounds [*] Lunge accurace increased by 5% at all levels [/list]
[b]Hellion[/b] [list] [*] Slightly increased damage for all weapon upgrades [/list]
[b]Highwayman[/b] [list] [*] Point Blank Shot now has accuracy increased by 5% at all levels [/list]
[b]HoundMaster[/b] [list] [*] Hound's Harry now does slightly more bleed from [1, 1, 2, 2, 3] to [1, 2, 3, 3, 4] [*] Howl now has 100% chance to hit but stress reduction was lowered from [2, 3, 4, 5, 6] to [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] [*] Howl now also applies a stress reduction buff with values [-5%, -5%, -6%, -6%, -7%] [/list]
[b]Occultist[/b] [list] [*] Wyrd Reconstruction now has a minimum heal of [1, 1, 2, 2, 3] [/list]
[b]Flagellant[/b] [list] [*] Exsanguinate now has accuracy increased by 5% at all levels [/list]
[h1]Inventory[/h1] [list] [*] Portrait stack increased to 6 [*] Bust stack increased to 8 [*] Crest stack increased to 14 [*] Deed stack increased to 8 [*] Trapezohedron stack increased to 3 [*] Pewrelic stack increased to 3 [*] Holy Relic stack increased to 3 [*] Grain sack stack increased to 3 [*] Torch stack increased to 16 [*] Shovel stack increased to 6 [*] Provision stack increased to 24 [*] Firewood stack increased to 5 [*] The Blood stack increased to 9 [*] The Cure stack increased to 9 [/list]
[h1]Nomad Wagon[/h1] [list] [*] Nomad Wagon has a chance to sell Crimson Court and Ancestral trinkets at 1.5% and 0.5% respectfully [/list]
[h1]Campaign[/h1] [list] [*] Apprentice dungeons now accept resolve level 3 Heroes [*] Veteran dungeons now accept resolve level 4 Heroes [/list]
